lead_paragraph: Four students began a 1,500-mile walk to Washington on Friday, the first steps in a new push by immigration advocates for reform before the midterm elections.
snippet: Four students began a 1,500-mile walk to Washington on Friday, the first steps in a new push by immigration advocates for reform before the midterm elections.

headline.main: To Overhaul Immigration, Advocates Alter Tactics
headline.seo: Advocates of Immigration Overhaul Alter Tactics in New Push
headline.print_headline: To Overhaul Immigration, Advocates Alter Tactics
